steps.title: Contact Me
steps.text: We can discuss your requirements to check we are aligned.

steps.title: Make an appointment
steps.text: I will visit to discuss your requirements in more detail.

steps.title: I will analyse the work
steps.text: I will provide you with a summary of our discussion together with a time estimate and recommended package.

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.text:
- Access to systems
- Agree frequency of catchups
- Your preferred working style
- Agree start date.

steps.title: Start of Engagement
steps.text: Regular reviews ensure we are working well together.
